description: Optional. If set, fields of `workspace_compilation_overrides` override the default compilation settings that are specified in dataform.json when creating workspace-scoped compilation results. See documentation for `WorkspaceCompilationOverrides` for more information.

defaultDatabase.description: Optional. The default database (Google Cloud project ID).

schemaSuffix.description: Optional. The suffix that should be appended to all schema (BigQuery dataset ID) names.

tablePrefix.description: Optional. The prefix that should be prepended to all table names.
